about_the_game:
Welcome to "crystal Nexus: Alien Siege"


In "Crystal Nexus: Alien Siege," you are one among many operators stationed across a sprawling corporate fleet, tasked with deploying defense drones to protect critical mining ventures on alien planets. Your role is pivotal, controlling the frontlines from orbit, utilizing a mix of strategic planning and real-time decision-making to fend off native extraterrestrial forces.

Key Features


Hybrid Gameplay: Experience the thrill of traditional tower defense merged with the depth of deck-building, creating a unique strategic gameplay loop.

Dynamic Combat Scenarios: Face off against diverse alien waves, each presenting unique challenges that demand tactical flexibility and strategic foresight.

Customizable Arsenal: Build your defensive strategy from a broad selection of weapon and buff cards, tailoring your approach to each encounter for maximum effectiveness.

Orbital Command: From the safety of your space station, direct the action on the ground, making pivotal decisions that influence the course of each battle.

Rich Sci-Fi Backdrop: Delve into a universe dominated by corporate interests and alien mysteries, where your actions have far-reaching implications.

For Everyone, Everywhere


"Crystal Nexus: Alien Siege" is made for players around the world. Check the Localization tab to see the languages available and help make the game even more accessible to everyone.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 and up
  • Processor: Intel i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 770 / AMD Radeon HD 7970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 and up
  • Processor: Intel i7 or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 480
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card

short_description: Dive into the strategic depths of "Crystal Nexus: Alien Siege," where the essence of tower defense merges with the ingenuity of deck-building. Operate from a corporate space station, leveraging your wits and a futuristic arsenal to counter a relentless alien threat.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Traditional Chinese
